ygData.subject: Re: Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...
ygData.msgSnippet: now that i have the brewing skill... that i think can sponsor abit to my throwing...  hopefully i wont be throwing em away faster than i can earn... anyway..
ygData.messageBody:
now that i have the brewing skill... that i think can sponsor abit to my throwing... hopefully i wont be throwing em away faster than i can earn... anyway.. if u miss or something... can u pick back ya thrown dagger?
----- Original Message -----
From: Sereph
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 5:02 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...


You can increase your throwing skills, but daggers are damn expensive unless you are a magician.
"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

huh? how come cannot increase? jialatz lah... so unfair... anyway... im not talking bout throwing that dagger away lah... just wanna improve my throwing if possible... max out all useful skills whenever i can... thast all... Nic
----- Original Message -----
From: Leshrec
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 3:57 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...
Yeah but I think caster cannot increase throwing skill. Anyways, dagger good for increase in mana so why throw it? )
-----Original Message-----
From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 09, 1999 2:37 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...
tot all chars got the skill throwing rite? so y cannot hit ler?
----- Original Message -----
From: Leshrec
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 3:28 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...
No char will not throw in auto attack. Any if you can hit with throwing weapon, i think you can become monk liao )
-----Original Message-----
From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>
To: SG-Everquest Mailing List <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 09, 1999 1:38 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...
last info i heard is that we can equip this dagger into the throwing slot... so when i auto attack will the char be stupid enough to throw? also... is shuriken useful? any suggestions as if i should pick up throwing? will be a useful tool if a wizard attempts to root me... n i can throw fast enough to disrupt him/her.. saw this in some disussion board... any comments?
